products.name: Original vegetable oil spread
products.facts: ["Made from a blend of vegetable oils such as soybean, canola, and palm oil.","Contains no trans fats, promoting heart health and better cholesterol levels.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Fortified with vitamins A and D for added nutritional benefits."]

products.name: Oatmeal squares
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, en:breakfast-cereals
products.facts: ["Oatmeal squares are typically made from whole grain oats, which are a good source of fiber.","The production of oats has a lower environmental impact compared to many other grains, requiring less water and fertilizer.","High-quality oatmeal squares often contain minimal added sugars and preservatives, focusing on natural ingredients.","Oats are known for their health benefits, including lowering cholesterol and stabilizing blood sugar levels."]

products.name: Seasoning complete
products.facts: ["Made with all-natural ingredients.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives.","Packaging is recyclable to reduce environmental impact.","Quality tested for flavor consistency and freshness."]

products.name: I can't believe it's not butter!, 45% vegetable oil spread, original
products.categories: Dairies, Fats, Spreads, Spreadable fats, Animal fats, Milkfat, Dairy spread, Butters
products.facts: ["Contains 45% vegetable oil, primarily sourced from sunflower and canola.","The product is designed to have a lower fat content compared to traditional butter.","Packaged in recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and trans fats, promoting higher quality standards."]

products.name: California Sun-dried Raisins
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Snacks, Fruits based foods, Dried products, Dried plant-based foods, Dried fruits, Raisins
products.packaging: 1 plastic lid, 1 plastic seal, 1 paper container
products.facts: ["California Sun-dried Raisins are made from 100% natural grapes, specifically Thompson Seedless variety.","The drying process is eco-friendly, utilizing the sun's energy, which reduces carbon footprint compared to other drying methods.","These raisins are rich in antioxidants and contain no added sugars or preservatives, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","California's climate provides optimal conditions for growing grapes, resulting in consistently high-quality raisins with rich flavor."]

products.name: Coconut Milk
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives, Plant-based creams, Plant-based creams for cooking, Coconut milks and creams, en:cereal-milks
products.facts: ["Coconut milk is made from the grated meat of mature coconuts mixed with water.","Coconut milk is a dairy-free alternative, making it suitable for vegans and those with lactose intolerance.","Coconuts are typically grown in tropical regions, which can impact local ecosystems and biodiversity.","Quality coconut milk should have a creamy texture and a rich flavor, with minimal additives or preservatives."]

products.name: Alpine Spring Water
products.facts: ["Alpine Spring Water is sourced from natural springs, ensuring a fresh and pure taste.","The 500 mL bottles are made from 100% recyclable PET plastic, promoting sustainability.","Alpine Spring Water undergoes rigorous quality testing to ensure it meets health and safety standards.","The water is bottled at the source to preserve its natural minerals and crisp flavor."]

products.name: Premium Oyster Sauce
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality oyster extracts and seasonings.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Sustainably sourced oysters to minimize ecological impact.","Rich in umami flavor, enhancing the quality of various dishes."]

products.name: Strawberry Fruit Spread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Fruits and vegetables based foods,Breakfasts,Spreads,Fruits based foods,Plant-based spreads,Sweet spreads,Fruit and vegetable preserves,Jams,Berry jams,Strawberry jams
products.labels: No gluten, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with real strawberries and natural ingredients.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Packaged in recyclable glass jars to reduce environmental impact.","Produced using sustainable farming practices to support local agriculture."]

products.name: Aloe
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based beverages, Fruit-based beverages, Non-alcoholic beverages, Aloe Vera drinks, Sweetened beverages
products.facts: ["Aloe - 500 ml is primarily made from organic aloe vera extract, ensuring a natural product free from synthetic additives.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, promoting sustainability and reducing environmental impact.","Aloe vera is known for its low water consumption, making it an eco-friendly crop that thrives in arid conditions.","The quality of Aloe - 500 ml is certified by various health and safety standards, ensuring it is safe for consumption and effective for skin care."]
